Home.title: Cutting-Edge
Home.description: Discover our wide range of technology products: from network equipment and servers to storage and energy solutions. Everything you need to power your business.
Home.exploreProducts: Explore our complete catalog of technology products from the best brands in the market.

Solutions.title: Solutions
Solutions.businessNeeds: Everything you need to run your business
Solutions.wideRange: We offer a wide range of solutions to meet your needs. From cybersecurity to networking, we have you covered.

cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.description: We provide top-tier cybersecurity solutions to protect your business from threats.

networking.name: Networking
networking.description: We offer robust and scalable networking solutions for your business.

servers.name: Servers
servers.description: We provide reliable and high-performance servers for your business needs.

storage.name: Storage
storage.description: We offer scalable and secure storage solutions for your data.

Alliances.title: Alliances
Alliances.partnerMessage: We partner with the best to bring you the best solutions.

alliances.3cx: 3CX is a software-based private branch exchange (PBX) based on the SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) standard.
alliances.avaya: Avaya is a global leader in communication systems, applications and services.
alliances.axis: Axis is the market leader in network video.
alliances.cambium: Cambium Networks is a leading global provider of wireless broadband solutions that connect the unconnected.
alliances.dahua: Dahua Technology is a world-leading video-centric smart IoT solution and service provider.
alliances.eset: ESET is a global provider of security software for companies and consumers.
alliances.extreme: Extreme Networks is a networking company that designs, develops, and manufactures wired and wireless network infrastructure equipment.
alliances.hp: Hewlett Packard Enterprise is a global technology leader focused on developing intelligent solutions for the hybrid world.
alliances.jabra: Jabra is a Danish brand specializing in audio equipment, and more recently, video conference systems.
alliances.lenovo: Lenovo is a Chinese multinational technology company that designs, develops, manufactures, and sells personal computers, tablet computers, smartphones, workstations, servers, electronic storage devices, IT management software, and smart televisions.
alliances.panduit: Panduit is a global manufacturer of physical infrastructure solutions that support power, communications, computing, control, and security systems.
alliances.vertiv: Vertiv is a global provider of critical digital infrastructure and continuity solutions.
alliances.watchguard: WatchGuard Technologies, Inc. is an American multinational cybersecurity company.
alliances.weboost: weBoost is a leading manufacturer of cell phone signal boosters.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: CECOM, S.A.S. is a company located in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, that operates in the fields of computer repair and information technology services. We have been in business for over 20 years, and we are dedicated to providing the best solutions for your business.
AboutUs.teamDescription: Meet the professionals who make our success and that of our clients possible.
AboutUs.partnersDescription: We work with the best brands in the market to offer you quality solutions.
AboutUs.ctaDescription: Contact us today and discover how we can help you achieve your technology goals.
AboutUs.learnMore: Learn more about our company, our team, and our values.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: We are here to help you. Get in touch with us for any inquiries about our technology services.

form.successMessage: Message sent successfully. We will get back to you soon.
form.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.
